file.title: Delete quotes

p.text: If the source is isolated quotes, the command removes those quotes. Also, if you meet two double quotes ( "") within the text, a separate quotation marks, then they will turn into one double quotes ( "" -!> "). For example, the text " Hello, "" Other "" " after the work of this command will become Hello "Friend" .
